name: Jungle Animal Hunter Pro 2017
description:
Jungle Animal Hunter Pro 2017 is best hunting game and fun when one is a professional hunter as an incompetent will threaten his life in trying to kill furious beasts. This Jungle Animal Hunter game is a brand new real hunting and sniper shooting experience which you might not been able to get in your real life. Those who cannot danger their life hunting wild animals can also enjoy real hunting experience by playing this game.
Be a modern animal sniper and gear up with your sniper rifle and let’s hunt. Wildlife animals are dangerous and are somewhere in this Jungle filled with lush green grass, mountains and trees. Kill Lion, Tiger, Deer, Wolf and other wildlife jungle animals. Plan your hunt well and look for headshots. Meanwhile, protect your hut in the middle of the jungle from these killer animals.

=Game Features

Realistic Jungle Hunting Environment
3D Graphics and Sound effects
True to life hunting experience
Efficient Weapon Control & Zoom
